dn10:1.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme aciraparinibbute bhagavati.
dn10:1.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena subho māṇavo todeyyaputto sāvatthiyaṁ paṭivasati kenacideva karaṇīyena.
dn10:1.2.1_0: Atha kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto aññataraṁ māṇavakaṁ āmantesi:
dn10:1.2.2_2: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṁ ānandaṁ appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ puccha:
dn10:1.2.3_0: ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṁ ānandaṁ appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī’ti.
dn10:1.3.1_0: ‘sādhu kira bhavaṁ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
dn10:1.3.2_1: bho”ti kho so māṇavako subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
dn10:1.3.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
dn10:1.3.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so māṇavako āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
dn10:1.3.4_0: “subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṁ ānandaṁ appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati;
dn10:1.3.6_0: ‘sādhu kira bhavaṁ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
dn10:1.4.4_0: Appevanāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti.
dn10:1.4.5_1: bho”ti kho so māṇavako āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena subho māṇavo todeyyaputto tenupasaṅkami;
dn10:1.4.6_0: “avocumhā kho mayaṁ bhoto vacanena taṁ bhavantaṁ ānandaṁ:
dn10:1.4.7_0: ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṁ ānandaṁ appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati, evañca vadeti:
dn10:1.4.8_0: “sādhu kira bhavaṁ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”’ti.
dn10:1.4.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, bho, samaṇo ānando maṁ etadavoca:
dn10:1.4.12_0: Appevanāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā’ti.
dn10:1.4.13_1: yato kho so bhavaṁ ānando okāsamakāsi svātanāyapi upasaṅkamanāyā”ti.
dn10:1.5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya cetakena bhikkhunā pacchāsamaṇena yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
dn10:1.5.1_2: Atha kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
dn10:1.5.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
dn10:1.5.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
dn10:1.5.3_0: “bhavañhi ānando tassa bhoto gotamassa dīgharattaṁ upaṭṭhāko santikāvacaro samīpacārī.
dn10:1.5.4_1: yesaṁ so bhavaṁ gotamo dhammānaṁ vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:1.5.4_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi.
dn10:1.5.5_1: dhammānaṁ so bhavaṁ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosi;
dn10:1.5.5_2: kattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesī”ti?
dn10:1.6.1_2: ettha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi.
dn10:1.6.3_0: Ariyassa sīlakkhandhassa, ariyassa samādhikkhandhassa, ariyassa paññākkhandhassa.
dn10:1.6.4_1: tiṇṇaṁ khandhānaṁ so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī ahosi;
dn10:1.6.4_2: ettha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesī”ti.
dn10:1.6.6_0: “Katamo pana so, bho ānanda, ariyo sīlakkhandho,
dn10:1.6.6_1: yassa so bhavaṁ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:1.6.6_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesī”ti?
dn10:1.7.1_1: tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
dn10:1.7.2_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
dn10:1.7.3_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
dn10:1.8.1_0: Taṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṁ vā kule paccājāto.
dn10:1.8.2_0: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
dn10:1.8.3_0: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati:
dn10:1.8.5_0: nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
dn10:1.8.6_0: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
dn10:1.9.1_0: So aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya appaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
dn10:1.10.1_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno,
dn10:1.10.1_3: kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato kusalena, parisuddhājīvo, sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro,
dn10:1.11.2_1: bhikkhu pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
dn10:1.11.3_1: bhikkhu pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
dn10:1.28.1_0: Yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvitaṁ kappenti,
dn10:1.28.2_0: seyyathidaṁ—santikammaṁ paṇidhikammaṁ bhūtakammaṁ bhūrikammaṁ vassakammaṁ vossakammaṁ vatthukammaṁ vatthuparikammaṁ ācamanaṁ nhāpanaṁ juhanaṁ vamanaṁ virecanaṁ uddhaṁvirecanaṁ adhovirecanaṁ sīsavirecanaṁ kaṇṇatelaṁ nettatappanaṁ natthukammaṁ añjanaṁ paccañjanaṁ sālākiyaṁ sallakattiyaṁ dārakatikicchā mūlabhesajjānaṁ anuppadānaṁ osadhīnaṁ paṭimokkho
dn10:1.28.3_0: iti vā iti evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvā paṭivirato hoti.
dn10:1.28.4_1: bhikkhu yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvitaṁ kappenti,
dn10:1.28.6_0: iti vā iti evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvā paṭivirato hoti.
dn10:1.29.1_1: bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn10:1.29.2_1: rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto nihatapaccāmitto na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ paccatthikato;
dn10:1.29.3_1: bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn10:1.29.4_0: So iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
dn10:1.29.5_0: Evaṁ kho, māṇava, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti.
dn10:1.30.1_1: ariyo sīlakkhandho yassa so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:1.30.1_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi.
dn10:1.30.5_1: ariyaṁ sīlakkhandhaṁ ito bahiddhā aññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu na samanupassāmi.
dn10:1.30.6_1: ariyaṁ sīlakkhandhaṁ ito bahiddhā aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇā attani samanupasseyyuṁ,
dn10:1.30.8_0: Atha ca pana bhavaṁ ānando evamāha:
dn10:2.1.1_0: “Katamo pana so, bho ānanda, ariyo samādhikkhandho,
dn10:2.1.1_1: yassa so bhavaṁ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:2.1.1_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesī”ti?
dn10:2.2.2_1: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
dn10:2.2.3_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ; tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ,
dn10:2.2.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
dn10:2.2.9_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ; tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati manindriyaṁ, manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
dn10:2.2.10_0: So iminā ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ abyāsekasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
dn10:2.3.2_5: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
dn10:2.3.2_7: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
dn10:2.4.2_1: bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena. So yena yeneva pakkamati, samādāyeva pakkamati.
dn10:2.4.3_1: pakkhī sakuṇo yena yeneva ḍeti, sapattabhārova ḍeti;
dn10:2.4.4_1: bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena. So yena yeneva pakkamati, samādāyeva pakkamati.
dn10:2.4.5_0: Evaṁ kho, māṇava, bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti.
dn10:2.5.1_0: So iminā ca ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato,
dn10:2.5.2_0: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
dn10:2.5.3_0: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā, ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya,
dn10:2.6.1_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti.
dn10:2.6.2_0: Byāpādapadosaṁ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī byāpādapadosā cittaṁ parisodheti.
dn10:2.6.3_0: Thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno,
dn10:2.6.4_0: Uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṁ parisodheti.
dn10:2.6.5_0: Vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu,
dn10:2.7.3_0: So yāni ca porāṇāni iṇamūlāni tāni ca byantiṁ kareyya,
dn10:2.7.5_0: ‘ahaṁ kho pubbe iṇaṁ ādāya kammante payojesiṁ.
dn10:2.7.7_0: Sohaṁ yāni ca porāṇāni iṇamūlāni tāni ca byantiṁ akāsiṁ,
dn10:2.7.7_1: atthi ca me uttariṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ dārabharaṇāyā’ti.
dn10:2.7.8_0: So tatonidānaṁ labhetha pāmojjaṁ, adhigaccheyya somanassaṁ.
dn10:2.8.1_1: puriso ābādhiko assa dukkhito bāḷhagilāno; bhattañcassa nacchādeyya, na cassa kāye balamattā.
dn10:2.8.2_0: So aparena samayena tamhā ābādhā mucceyya, bhattañcassa chādeyya, siyā cassa kāye balamattā.
dn10:2.8.4_0: ‘ahaṁ kho pubbe ābādhiko ahosiṁ dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, bhattañca me nacchādesi, na ca me āsi kāye balamattā.
dn10:2.8.5_0: Somhi etarahi tamhā ābādhā mutto bhattañca me chādeti,
dn10:2.8.6_0: So tatonidānaṁ labhetha pāmojjaṁ, adhigaccheyya somanassaṁ.
dn10:2.9.2_0: So aparena samayena tamhā bandhanāgārā mucceyya sotthinā abbhayena, na cassa kiñci bhogānaṁ vayo.
dn10:2.9.5_0: Somhi etarahi tamhā bandhanāgārā mutto sotthinā abbhayena,
dn10:2.9.5_1: natthi ca me kiñci bhogānaṁ vayo’ti.
dn10:2.9.6_0: So tatonidānaṁ labhetha pāmojjaṁ, adhigaccheyya somanassaṁ.
dn10:2.10.1_1: puriso dāso assa anattādhīno parādhīno na yenakāmaṅgamo.
dn10:2.10.2_0: So aparena samayena tamhā dāsabyā mucceyya,
dn10:2.10.4_0: ‘ahaṁ kho pubbe dāso ahosiṁ anattādhīno parādhīno na yenakāmaṅgamo.
dn10:2.10.5_0: Somhi etarahi tamhā dāsabyā mutto attādhīno aparādhīno bhujisso yenakāmaṅgamo’ti.
dn10:2.10.6_0: So tatonidānaṁ labhetha pāmojjaṁ, adhigaccheyya somanassaṁ.
dn10:2.11.1_1: puriso sadhano sabhogo kantāraddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjeyya dubbhikkhaṁ sappaṭibhayaṁ.
dn10:2.11.2_0: So aparena samayena taṁ kantāraṁ nitthareyya,
dn10:2.11.4_0: ‘ahaṁ kho pubbe sadhano sabhogo kantāraddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjiṁ dubbhikkhaṁ sappaṭibhayaṁ.
dn10:2.11.6_0: So tatonidānaṁ labhetha pāmojjaṁ, adhigaccheyya somanassaṁ.
dn10:2.12.1_1: bhikkhu yathā iṇaṁ yathā rogaṁ yathā bandhanāgāraṁ yathā dāsabyaṁ yathā kantāraddhānamaggaṁ,
dn10:2.12.1_2: evaṁ ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīne attani samanupassati.
dn10:2.12.2_1: yathā āṇaṇyaṁ yathā ārogyaṁ yathā bandhanāmokkhaṁ yathā bhujissaṁ yathā khemantabhūmiṁ.
dn10:2.12.3_0: Evameva kho bhikkhu ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahīne attani samanupassati.
dn10:2.12.4_0: Tassime pañca nīvaraṇe pahīne attani samanupassato pāmojjaṁ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati,
dn10:2.12.4_1: pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
dn10:2.13.1_0: So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.

dn10:2.17.3_1: uppaliniyaṁ vā paduminiyaṁ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṁ vā appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṁvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni antonimuggaposīni,
dn10:2.17.3_2: tāni yāva caggā yāva ca mūlā sītena vārinā abhisannāni parisannāni paripūrāni paripphuṭāni,
dn10:2.17.3_3: nāssa kiñci sabbāvataṁ uppalānaṁ vā padumānaṁ vā puṇḍarīkānaṁ vā sītena vārinā apphuṭaṁ assa.
dn10:2.17.5_1: bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn10:2.17.6_0: So imameva kāyaṁ nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati,
dn10:2.17.6_1: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
dn10:2.18.1_1: bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn10:2.18.2_0: So imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti;
dn10:2.18.3_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
dn10:2.18.4_1: puriso odātena vatthena sasīsaṁ pārupitvā nisinno assa,
dn10:2.18.4_2: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa odātena vatthena apphuṭaṁ assa.
dn10:2.18.6_1: bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn10:2.18.7_0: So imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti;
dn10:2.18.7_1: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
dn10:2.19.1_1: ariyo samādhikkhandho yassa so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:2.19.1_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi.
dn10:2.19.5_1: ariyaṁ samādhikkhandhaṁ ito bahiddhā aññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu na samanupassāmi.
dn10:2.19.6_1: ariyaṁ samādhikkhandhaṁ ito bahiddhā aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇā attani samanupasseyyuṁ,
dn10:2.19.8_0: Atha ca pana bhavaṁ ānando evamāha:
dn10:2.20.1_0: Katamo pana so, bho ānanda, ariyo paññākkhandho,
dn10:2.20.1_1: yassa bho bhavaṁ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:2.20.1_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesī”ti?
dn10:2.21.1_0: “So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.21.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho me kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo odanakummāsūpacayo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammo;
dn10:2.21.3_1: idañca pana me viññāṇaṁ ettha sitaṁ ettha paṭibaddhan’ti.
dn10:2.22.1_1: maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anāvilo sabbākārasampanno.
dn10:2.22.1_2: Tatrāssa suttaṁ āvutaṁ nīlaṁ vā pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā odātaṁ vā paṇḍusuttaṁ vā.
dn10:2.22.2_0: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso hatthe karitvā paccavekkheyya:
dn10:2.22.2_1: ‘ayaṁ kho maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anāvilo sabbākārasampanno.
dn10:2.22.2_2: Tatridaṁ suttaṁ āvutaṁ nīlaṁ vā pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā odātaṁ vā paṇḍusuttaṁ vā’ti.
dn10:2.22.3_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.22.5_0: ‘ayaṁ kho me kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo odanakummāsūpacayo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammo.
dn10:2.22.5_1: Idañca pana me viññāṇaṁ ettha sitaṁ ettha paṭibaddhan’ti.
dn10:2.22.6_0: Yampi, māṇava, bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte …pe…
dn10:2.23.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte manomayaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmānāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.23.2_0: So imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
dn10:2.24.3_0: ‘ayaṁ muñjo ayaṁ īsikā; añño muñjo aññā īsikā;
dn10:2.24.4_0: Seyyathā vā pana, māṇava, puriso asiṁ kosiyā pavāheyya.
dn10:2.24.6_0: ‘ayaṁ asi, ayaṁ kosi; añño asi, aññā kosi; kosiyā tveva asi pavāḷho’ti.
dn10:2.24.9_0: ‘ayaṁ ahi, ayaṁ karaṇḍo; añño ahi, añño karaṇḍo; karaṇḍā tveva ahi ubbhato’ti.
dn10:2.24.11_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte manomayaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmānāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti …pe….
dn10:2.25.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.25.2_0: So anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
dn10:2.25.2_1: āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvaṁ tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse;
dn10:2.25.2_4: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
dn10:2.25.2_5: imepi candimasūriye evaṁ mahiddhike evaṁ mahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
dn10:2.26.1_1: dakkho kumbhakāro vā kumbhakārantevāsī vā suparikammakatāya mattikāya yaññadeva bhājanavikatiṁ ākaṅkheyya,
dn10:2.26.2_1: dakkho dantakāro vā dantakārantevāsī vā suparikammakatasmiṁ dantasmiṁ yaññadeva dantavikatiṁ ākaṅkheyya,
dn10:2.26.3_1: dakkho suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā suparikammakatasmiṁ suvaṇṇasmiṁ yaññadeva suvaṇṇavikatiṁ ākaṅkheyya,
dn10:2.26.4_1: bhikkhu …pe… yampi māṇava bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.26.5_0: So anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti.
dn10:2.27.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte dibbāya sotadhātuyā cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti
dn10:2.27.2_0: So dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca.
dn10:2.27.3_3: Tassa evamassa—bherisaddo itipi mudiṅgasaddo itipi saṅkhapaṇavadindimasaddo itipi.
dn10:2.27.5_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte dibbāya sotadhātuyā cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.27.6_0: So dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca.
dn10:2.28.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.28.2_0: So parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti,
dn10:2.29.1_1: itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanajātiko ādāse vā parisuddhe pariyodāte acche vā udakapatte sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno sakaṇikaṁ vā sakaṇikanti jāneyya,
dn10:2.29.3_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite …pe… āneñjappatte cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.29.4_0: So parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti,
dn10:2.29.5_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānāti …pe…
dn10:2.29.6_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajānāti.
dn10:2.30.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti
dn10:2.30.2_1: Seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe:
dn10:2.30.2_2: ‘amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto. So tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ;
dn10:2.30.2_3: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto; so tato cuto idhūpapanno’ti.
dn10:2.30.2_4: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
dn10:2.31.1_1: puriso sakamhā gāmā aññaṁ gāmaṁ gaccheyya;
dn10:2.31.1_3: so tamhā gāmā sakaṁyeva gāmaṁ paccāgaccheyya. Tassa evamassa:
dn10:2.31.1_4: ‘ahaṁ kho sakamhā gāmā amuṁ gāmaṁ agacchiṁ,
dn10:2.31.1_5: tatra evaṁ aṭṭhāsiṁ evaṁ nisīdiṁ evaṁ abhāsiṁ evaṁ tuṇhī ahosiṁ.
dn10:2.31.1_6: So tamhāpi gāmā amuṁ gāmaṁ gacchiṁ,
dn10:2.31.1_7: tatrāpi evaṁ aṭṭhāsiṁ evaṁ nisīdiṁ evaṁ abhāsiṁ evaṁ tuṇhī ahosiṁ.
dn10:2.31.1_8: Somhi tamhā gāmā sakaṁyeva gāmaṁ paccāgato’ti.
dn10:2.31.2_0: Evameva kho, māṇava, bhikkhu …pe… yampi, māṇava,
dn10:2.31.2_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.31.3_1: Seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
dn10:2.32.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte sattānaṁ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.32.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
dn10:2.32.2_2: ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṁ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā.
dn10:2.32.2_3: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā.
dn10:2.32.2_4: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṁ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā.
dn10:2.32.2_5: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā’ti.
dn10:2.32.2_6: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
dn10:2.33.1_1: tattha cakkhumā puriso ṭhito passeyya manusse gehaṁ pavisantepi nikkhamantepi rathikāyapi vīthiṁ sañcarante majjhesiṅghāṭake nisinnepi. Tassa evamassa:
dn10:2.33.3_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte sattānaṁ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.33.4_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
dn10:2.34.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.35.1_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
dn10:2.36.1_2: Tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampi. Tassa evamassa:
dn10:2.36.1_4: Tatrime sippisambukāpi sakkharakathalāpi macchagumbāpi carantipi tiṭṭhantipī’ti.
dn10:2.36.3_1: bhikkhu evaṁ samāhite citte …pe… āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
dn10:2.36.6_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
dn10:2.36.6_3: vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti, ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ,
dn10:2.37.1_1: ariyo paññākkhandho yassa so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
dn10:2.37.1_2: yattha ca imaṁ janataṁ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi.
dn10:2.37.5_1: ariyaṁ paññākkhandhaṁ ito bahiddhā aññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu na samanupassāmi.
dn10:2.37.7_0: Abhikkantaṁ, bho ānanda, abhikkantaṁ, bho ānanda.
dn10:2.37.8_0: Seyyathāpi, bho ānanda, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya,
dn10:2.37.8_4: evamevaṁ bhotā ānandena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
dn10:2.37.9_1: taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
dn10:2.37.10_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ ānando dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
